bibl.title: A Fragmentary Ptolemaic Petition in Lille.
bibl.note: P. Lille Inv. 77A; 77B [ed.: Bernard BOYAVAL, Une allusion inédite à un prostagma lagide, ChrEg 68 (1993) Nos 135-136, pp. 155-159, 2 figg.]: the exact position of the two fragments. The text is a petition about the ownership of land, probably clerouchic land. It is to be dated to the later part of the reign of Ptolemy VIII Euergetes (138-117 B.C.).
CLARYSSE Willy, A Fragmentary Ptolemaic Petition in Lille.
